author: oheger
msg: [CONFIGURATION-428] Updated changes.xml. Ported from trunk. However, the fix for this issue will not be ported because list handling is going to change anyway.

author: jbellis
msg: warn on cli LIST command when not authenticated to a keyspace.

author: arkurth
msg: Updated vcld to add a reference to the DataStructure object for a reservation to %ENV.  This allows it to be accessed from subroutines which aren't called as a VCL::Module object method.  Also cleaned up some old, unused code.
